(Affinity Ablaze) Arms of Balance: Walki.name: (Affinity Ablaze) Arms of Balance: Walking the Cardinal Paths
(Affinity Ablaze) Arms of Balance: Walki.description:
Frequency once per day

There are few bonds like those between fighters who have shared blows in an arena, and in so doing, come to understand each other. You focus on your emotional connection to one of the other tournament teams, and their power roars along it to you like a string set alight. You use the following ability, which you must have gained access to from the original team.

The ki within you surges to coat your attacks in energy matter. For 1 minute, one of your weapons or your unarmed Strikes deal an additional 2d6 fire, cold, acid, or electricity damage. The Strikes gain the appropriate energy trait as well.

(Affinity Ablaze) Biting Roses: Glimpses.name: (Affinity Ablaze) Biting Roses: Glimpses to Beyond
(Affinity Ablaze) Biting Roses: Glimpses.description:
Frequency once per day

There are few bonds like those between fighters who have shared blows in an arena, and in so doing, come to understand each other. You focus on your emotional connection to one of the other tournament teams, and their power roars along it to you like a string set alight. You use the following ability, which you must have gained access to from the original team.

You gain a sense for the supernatural and the flow of fate. For 1 hour, you gain spiritsense as a precise sense with a range of 60 feet. Spiritsense enables you to sense the spirits of creatures, including living creatures, most non-mindless undead, and haunts within the listed range. As with your hearing and other imprecise senses, you still need to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.BlAOM2X92SI6HMtJ]{Seek} to locate an undetected creature. As spiritsense detects spiritual essence, not physical bodies, it can detect spirits projected by spells such as project image or possessing otherwise soulless objects. It can't detect soulless bodies, constructs, or objects. Once during the spell's duration, when you roll a failure or critical failure on a saving throw or skill check, you get a success instead.

(Affinity Ablaze) Speakers to the Winds:.name: (Affinity Ablaze) Speakers to the Winds: All is One, One is All
(Affinity Ablaze) Speakers to the Winds:.description:
Frequency once per day

There are few bonds like those between fighters who have shared blows in an arena, and in so doing, come to understand each other. You focus on your emotional connection to one of the other tournament teams, and their power roars along it to you like a string set alight. You use the following ability, which you must have gained access to from the original team.

Borrowing the magic of the Magaambya, you use a legendary spell from Old-Mage Jatembe himself. You cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.gtWxTfMbIN5RHQw6]{All is One, One is All} as a 9th-rank arcane or primal innate spell.

(Affinity Ablaze) Steps of the Sun: Gran.name: (Affinity Ablaze) Steps of the Sun: Grand Harmony
(Affinity Ablaze) Steps of the Sun: Gran.description:
Frequency once per day

There are few bonds like those between fighters who have shared blows in an arena, and in so doing, come to understand each other. You focus on your emotional connection to one of the other tournament teams, and their power roars along it to you like a string set alight. You use the following ability, which you must have gained access to from the original team.

Your heart harmonizes with those of your comrades before pounding once in a devastating shock wave. You deal @Damage[18d4[sonic]] damage in a @Template[type:cone|distance:60]. Enemies can attempt a @Check[fortitude|against:class-spell|basic] save with a DC equal to your class DC or spell DC, whichever is higher. If you are adjacent to at least 1 ally, this deals @Damage[18d6[sonic]]{18d6}, if you are adjacent to at least 2 allies, this deals @Damage[18d8[sonic]]{18d8}.

(Affinity Ablaze) Winter's Roar: Rampagi.name: (Affinity Ablaze) Winter's Roar: Rampaging Glacier Charge
(Affinity Ablaze) Winter's Roar: Rampagi.description:
Frequency once per day

There are few bonds like those between fighters who have shared blows in an arena, and in so doing, come to understand each other. You focus on your emotional connection to one of the other tournament teams, and their power roars along it to you like a string set alight. You use the following ability, which you must have gained access to from the original team.

You emulate the inexorable movement of a glacier. You Stride up to your Speed and make a melee Strike. Regardless of whether your attack hits, the path of your Stride is filled by a 9th-rank @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.R5FHRv7VqyRnxg2t]{Wall of Ice}.

Administer.name: Verwalten
Administer.description:
You spend the day attending to administrative needs related to running Citadel Altaerein. The Administer activity can be used to undo poor public relations from the use of Deception or Intimidate to Organize Labor, but it is also used to maintain relations with groups you make contact with over the course of the Age of Ashes campaign.

Only one person can attempt to Administer per day (though others can Aid, as described in the Core Rulebook), and once the castle has been Administered, no one else can Administer until after the interval specified in the result. However, the GM might allow exceptions to this if, for instance, the group is about to go on an adventure and wants to make sure the citadel runs smoothly while they're gone.

If you perform downtime activities involving Citadel Altaerein when it's not successfully Administered, you take a -4 circumstance penalty to your checks.

Administering requires a successful @Check[society|dc:20] check (although for special actions later in the Adventure Path, this DC may change). You can pay a seneschal to attend to Citadel Altaerein's administrative needs. As long as the seneschal is paid, the weekly requirement to Administer is automatically a success (but never a critical success).

Critical Success You facilitate the prosperity of the citadel. The citadel functions smoothly for 1 month. In addition, during this time you gain a +2 circumstance bonus to all checks to Organize Labor.

Success Citadel Altaerein functions smoothly for 1 week.

Failure Citadel Altaerein is not Administered, but you can try again the next day.

Critical Failure Citadel Altaerein is not Administered. Botched relations and flared tempers among certain citizens in Breachill prevent you from attempting to Administer again for 1 week.

Ancestors' Call.name: Ruf der Ahnen
Ancestors' Call.description:
Aspekt Verstand

Zwergengeister werden von diesem Relikt angezogen, und du kannst sie anrufen, damit sie in dich und deine Verbündeten fahren und euch Geheimnisse der Vorfahren übermitteln. Wenn du diese Gabe erhältst, wähle drei gewöhnliche Abstammungstalente für Zwerge der Stufe 1.

Aktivieren 1 Vorstellung

Häufigkeit einmal pro Stunde

Effekt Wähle eines der drei Abstammungstalente. Du und jeder Verbündete innerhalb von 10 Fuß/3 m von dir erhält für 1 Minute dieses Talent sowie die Kategorie Zwerg.

Appeal to Shadowy Intruders.name: Appeal to Shadowy Intruders
Appeal to Shadowy Intruders.description:
Requirements A fetchling sneak you can see is visibly shaken, such as by being reduced to half of their maximum Hit Points or fewer.

You call out to a visibly shaken foe and attempt to convince them to surrender. Depending upon your strategy, attempt a @Check[deception|defense:will], @Check[diplomacy|defense:will], or @Check[intimidation|defense:will] check against the foe's Will DC to make your case for the foe's surrender.

Critical Success The foe is quick to surrender and attempts to convince their allies to surrender as well. You and your allies gain a +1 circumstance bonus to checks to Appeal to Shadowy Intruders for 1 minute.

Success The foe takes your words to heart and surrenders to you immediately.

Failure The foe brushes off your attempt and continues to fight.

Critical Failure Your argument is severely flawed or laughable. The foe disregards your words and continues to fight. You take a -1 circumstance penalty to checks to Appeal to Shadowy Intruders for 1 minute.

Approach Duneshadow.name: Sich Dünenschatten nähern
Approach Duneshadow.description:
Once the PCs have Tracked Duneshadow, they begin intermittently sighting him atop distant hills, hear his bellowing calls, or sense other signs that he's near. The camel is remarkably cunning and stealthy, able to exploit heat shimmers to hide his movements, predict hunters' next steps, and make exceptional use of the terrain. All the while, his path leads the PCs farther into the foothills of the Brazen Peaks.

An attempt to Approach Duneshadow is a slow and deliberate activity that takes 1 hour to perform, during which each PC attempts a skill check chosen from the following options: @Check[acrobatics|dc:37] or @Check[athletics|dc:37] (to approach quickly via a shortcut), @Check[deception|dc:38] (to trick Duneshadow into evading pursuit in the wrong direction), @Check[nature|dc:35] (to keep Duneshadow calm and appear non-threatening), @Check[performance|dc:34] (to intrigue Duneshadow with calming music), or @Check[stealth|dc:36] (to approach undetected). Lore skills can be substituted for any of these skills, reducing the DC by 2. To reach Duneshadow, the party must successfully Approach four times. Critical successes count as two successes, and critical failures negate one success. If this reduces the total to two or fewer, Duneshadow runs off and the PCs must Scout for his location all over again.

Assessing Tatzlford's Defenses.name: Tatzelfurt Verteidigungsmaßnahmen bestimmen
Assessing Tatzlford's Defenses.description:
Die Gruppe wendet eine Stunde auf, um potenzielle Verbesserungsmöglichkeiten bei den Verteidigungsanlagen des Dorfes zu erarbeiten. Die SC kommen automatisch zu dem Ergebnis, dass das Errichten von Barrikaden hilfreich wäre - dies verleiht ihnen Zugang zur Aktivität Barrikaden errichten (siehe unten). Lege sodann einen Reichswurf für Verteidigung gegen SG 23 oder für Kriegskunst gegen SG 27 ab; dies kann potenziell den Zugang zu den Aktivitäten Fallen stellen, Feuertöpfe vorbereiten, Heckenschützen postieren oder Tiere einsetzen eröffnen. Sollten einige dieser Dinge den Spielern selbst einfallen oder sie mit ihren Ideen nahe genug sein, erhalten sie den fraglichen Zugang unabhängig vom Würfelergebnis.

Kritischer Erfolg Die Gruppe erlangt Zugang zu allen vier weiteren Verteidigungshandlungen.

Erfolg Die Gruppe erlangt Zugang zu zwei weiteren, zufällig bestimmten Verteidigungshandlungen.

Fehlschlag Die Gruppe erlangt Zugang zu einer weiteren, zufällig bestimmten Verteidigungshandlung.

Kritischer Fehlschlag Den SC fällt leider nur ein, Barrikaden zu errichten.

Azata's Grace.name: Azata's Grace
Azata's Grace.description:
Aspect celestial

Activate 2 command, Interact

Frequency once per day

Effect Monarch opens a conduit to Desna's palace of Cynosure and infuses your soul with the grace of the azatas who dance and frolic therein. You gain 50 additional Hit Points, increasing both your maximum and current Hit Points, as well as weakness 10 to lawful damage. You also gain the effects of the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.adventure-specific-actions.Item.EbF9U21iMu0JkTzG]{Righteous Call} gift, without expending that gift's daily use.

You can Dismiss the effect. If you do so, you unleash a wave of chaotic power in the form of a rainbow-like pulse of light, causing the relic to cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.uEyfLoFQsRKBRIcB]{Confusing Colors}. The effects of this casting of scintillating pattern don't affect your allies.

Beginner's Luck.name: Anfängerglück
Beginner's Luck.description:
Aspekt Glück

Aktivieren r Vorstellung

Häufigkeit Einmal am Tag

Auslöser Du legst einen Wurf mit einem W20 ab, in dem du den Kompetenzgrad Ungeübt besitzt

Effekt Behandle deinen Kompetenzbonus gleich deiner halben Stufe, bzw. gleich deiner Stufe, sollte das Relikt wenigstens Gegenstandsstufe 7 besitzen. Dann würfle zweimal und behalte das bessere Ergebnis. Dies erlaubt dir allerdings nicht, die Handlungen einer Fertigkeit zu nutzen, welche den Kompetenzgrad Geübt voraussetzen.

Blend In.name: Eintauchen
Blend In.description:
Overcome @Check[deception|dc:35], @Check[society|dc:37], @Check[stealth|dc:35]

Sometimes the best option for crossing a crowded party is to act natural and join the crowd.

If a PC successfully Blends In, roll a secret @Check[perception|dc:34|traits:secret] for them to notice that something seems off about one of the guests. On a success, inform them about the Dispel a Disguise Opportunity.

Breaking and Entering.name: Einbrechen
Breaking and Entering.description:
Overcome @Check[acrobatics|dc:37], @Check[athletics|dc:35], @Check[nature|dc:35],@Check[stealth|dc:35], @Check[thievery|dc:35]

The PCs scale the walls, calm the guard dogs, hide from guards, and unlock gates.

Special If a PC successfully Breaks and Enters, they can attempt a @Check[perception|dc:35|traits:secret] to notice a set of keys carried by a guard or resting in a somewhat hard-to-reach area, allowing for that PC to take the Steal Keys Opportunity.

Breaking the Chains.name: Die Ketten brechen
Breaking the Chains.description:
Requirements The PCs have overcome the other three Obstacles for this phase.

Overcome 2 successes; @Check[athletics|dc:37], @Check[thievery|dc:33]

The captives are sealed behind bars and chained to the walls. The PCs undo these bindings as quietly as possible. Once the PCs defeat this Obstacle, they have freed Exavisu and one of her assistants and can begin Phase 4: Extraction. See the That's Not Everyone Complication.

Build Connections.name: Kontakte knüpfen
Build Connections.description:
You dedicate a day to making friends in high places, typically by inviting yourself to parties, performing small favors to be repaid later, and generally projecting an aura of confidence and capability. Attempt a @Check[crafting|dc:36], @Check[diplomacy|dc:36], @Check[performance|dc:36], or appropriate Lore check. The result determines the impact of your efforts. If you have the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.iCv8KTZ5PcF4GqeV]{Leverage Connections} skill feat and roll a success, you get a critical success instead.

Critical Success For 1 month, you gain a +1 circumstance bonus to your skill checks to pursue the downtime activities listed here. You also earn a single favor that you can call in when you or an ally you're working with attempts a skill check for one of these downtime actions. That creature can roll twice and use the better result, after which the favor is considered repaid; calling in the favor is a fortune effect.

Success For 1 week, you gain a +1 circumstance bonus to your skill checks for the downtime activities listed here.

Critical Failure A faux pas embarrasses you, and rumors recount the incident widely. For 3 days, you take a -1 circumstance penalty to skill checks for the downtime activities listed here.

Build Infirmary.name: Lazarett einrichten
Build Infirmary.description:
Requirements Crafting (master), Medicine (master), or hired medic; organized specialists

Choose a single room in Citadel Altaerein to serve as a dedicated infirmary. Once complete, the infirmary fulfills the healer's tools requirement for Medicine skill actions and grants a +2 circumstance bonus to Medicine checks made on site. This upgrade requires 20 days of work and a @Check[crafting|dc:25] or @Check[medicine|dc:25] check.

Build Library.name: Bibliothek einrichten
Build Library.description:
Requirements Crafting (master), any Lore (master), or hired bookmaker; organized specialists

Pick a single room in Citadel Altaerein to serve as a library. Once complete, the library grants a +2 circumstance bonus to skill checks made to Borrow an Arcane Spell, Create Forgery, Decipher Writing, Identify Alchemy, Identify Magic, Learn a Spell, or Recall Knowledge as long as the PC performing the action is on site. This upgrade takes 20 days of work and a @Check[crafting|dc:25] or Lore check.

Build Training Facility.name: Trainingseinrichtung einrichten
Build Training Facility.description:
Requirements expert in the skill listed below or hired trainer; organized specialists

Pick a room in Citadel Altaerein to serve as a training area for a single character class (you can have multiple training facilities, with each one devoted to a different class). Once complete, the training facility fills the role of a teacher when using the Retrain downtime activity for the chosen class, and reduces the time required to retrain a feat or skill increase by 2 days and the time required to retrain a class feature by 1 week. This upgrade takes 40 days of work.

Building the facility requires a DC 25 skill check using a skill depending on the class in question, as listed below. If a class lists multiple skills, the PC can choose whichever one they like (but they must be an expert in the chosen skill, as noted in the Requirements entry above).

  • Alchemist @Check[crafting|dc:25]
  • Barbarian @Check[athletics|dc:25]
  • Bard @Check[occultism|dc:25] or @Check[performance|dc:25]
  • Champion @Check[religion|dc:25]
  • Cleric @Check[religion|dc:25]
  • Druid @Check[nature|dc:25]
  • Fighter @Check[acrobatics|dc:25] or @Check[athletics|dc:25]
  • Monk @Check[acrobatics|dc:25] or @Check[athletics|dc:25]
  • Ranger @Check[athletics|dc:25], @Check[nature|dc:25], or @Check[survival|dc:25]
  • Rogue @Check[acrobatics|dc:25] or @Check[thievery|dc:25]
  • Sorcerer @Check[arcana|dc:25], @Check[nature|dc:25], @Check[occultism|dc:25], or @Check[religion|dc:25]
  • Wizard @Check[arcana|dc:25]

Build Workshop (Crafting).name: Werkstatt einrichten (Handwerkskunst)
Build Workshop (Crafting).description:
Requirements Crafting (master), Specialty Crafting (any), or any hired specialist; organized specialists

Pick a room in Citadel Altaerein to serve as a crafting area for a specific Crafting skill chosen from one of the crafting specialties listed under the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.QLeMH5mQgh28sa5o]{Specialty Crafting} feat. You can have multiple workshops, each devoted to its own skill. Use of a workshop grants a +1 circumstance bonus to Crafting checks, or a +3 circumstance bonus to Crafting skill checks associated with that workshop's specialty. This upgrade takes 20 days of work to complete and a @Check[crafting|dc:25] check.

Chained Charge.name: Chained Charge
Chained Charge.description: You Stride and then make a tusk Strike at the end of your movement. If you move farther than 15 feet from your chained allies, you pull them along to the nearest open space 15 feet behind you. The creature you hit must succeed at a @Check[reflex|dc:35] save or fall @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Prone}.

Check the Walls.name: Überprüft die Mauern
Check the Walls.description:
A PC spends a day studying the walls and patrolling them. The PC then attempts either a @Check[arcana|dc:32] check or a @Check[crafting|dc:27] check.

Critical Success The PC discovers an irregularity in the protective runes along the western portion of the wall-a subtle distortion of the stone and magic that's a sign of repetitive strain, and while no obvious source for this strain is apparent, the distortions suggest the hidden source lies somewhere underground in the immediate area. Unfortunately, further research into city documents and architectural plans do not reveal the existence of any underground chambers in the area, suggesting either that no such chamber exists or, if it does, the records are either faulty or missing.

Success The PC discovers the irregularity in the barrier in the western portion of the wall-enough to confirm Alljoiner Garnis's fears, yet not enough to suggest the source of the strain.

Failure While the PC is able to discern some basic information about the city's barriers, it is not enough to find the structural flaws. Once the PCs report to her, Alljoiner Garnis suggests the PC tries again to confirm their suspicions, as she still feels there's more to learn.

Critical Failure The PC discovers what they believe to be a flaw long the eastern walls that is, in fact, merely a quirk of the ancient magic's design. When the PCs report this finding to Alljoiner Garnis, she confronts Archmage Nalruven with the information, who immediately inspects the area and accurately points out the PCs' error. This failure on the PC's part results in both Alljoiner Garnis and Mountainheart Chiselrock becoming less supportive of the PCs' efforts in Kovlar.

Clean.name: Aufräumen
Clean.description: Du verbringst den Tag mit Aufräumen und Saubermachen - du schleppst zertrümmerte Möbel hinaus, beseitigst Schmutz und schaffst Raum für Reparaturarbeiten. In der Zitadelle Altaerein fallen insgesamt 8 Tage an Aufräumarbeiten an, ehe andere einfache Reparaturen durchgeführt werden können. Aufräumen erfordert keinen Fertigkeitswurf für Handwerkskunst und kostet auch kein Gold.

Clear Courtyard.name: Innenhof säubern
Clear Courtyard.description:
Requirements Crafting (trained) or hired stonemason; organized workers

You work to repair the collapsed northern wall, drain and fill in the flooded sunken area, and clear out weeds. This activity requires 6 days of work and a @Check[crafting|dc:15] check.

Communicate From Beyond.name: Communicate From Beyond
Communicate From Beyond.description:
Requirements Students are present to witness your attempt to communicate. There are appropriate means of communication, such as items of negligible Bulk to manipulate, powder to write in, or lights to make a pattern.

You try to communicate a simple message to the students from your phase of reality. Attempt a

Levels 1-2

  • @Check[athletics|dc:15],
  • @Check[diplomacy|dc:15]
  • @Check[occultism|dc:15], or
  • @Check[thievery|dc:15] check

Levels 3-4

  • @Check[athletics|dc:18],
  • @Check[diplomacy|dc:18]
  • @Check[occultism|dc:18], or
  • @Check[thievery|dc:18]

with the following results.

Critical Success You communicate a phrase of up to 10 words.

Success You clearly communicate one word to the students.

Failure The students cannot understand your communications.

Critical Failure The students misinterpret your message, gaining incorrect information determined by the GM.

Contact Steel Falcons.name: Die Stahlfalken kontaktieren
Contact Steel Falcons.description:
Overcome @Check[andoran-lore|dc:32], @Check[diplomacy|dc:36], @Check[society|dc:34]

The PC surreptitiously tries to contact the Steel Falcons in Katapesh.

Success The PC arranges a meeting with the Steel Falcons. They're eager to combine forces with powerful operatives like the PCs in the name of liberating the oppressed, and they can provide information about the upcoming auction equivalent to a Gather Information success. In addition, the Steel Falcons grant the PCs 1 Edge Point.

Failure The PC fails to make contact.

Critical Failure The PC's clumsy attempt spooks the Steel Falcons. Future attempts at this activity take a -2 circumstance penalty.

Special If the PCs don't succeed at this Opportunity, the Steel Falcons independently decide to launch their own heist that overlaps with-and potentially interferes with-the PCs' heist.

Convince Mengkare.name: Mengkare überzeugen
Convince Mengkare.description:
Du debattierst mehrere Minuten lang mit dem Golddrachen Mengkare und präsentierst dabei Informationen, welche möglicherweise seinen Zweifelwert anheben und ihn dazu bringen können, seine Pläne, die Bürger von Hoffnung zu opfern, zu überdenken.

Wähle eine der zu deiner Argumentationsthematik aufgeführten Fertigkeiten und lege dafür einen Wurf ab. Der SG hängt von der genutzten Fertigkeit ab, wie weiter unten aufgeführt.

Kritischer Du erhöhst Mengkares Zweifelwert um 2.

Erfolg Du erhöhst Mengkares Zweifelwert um 1.

Fehlschlag Du schaffst es nicht, Mengkares Zweifelwert zu erhöhen.

Kritischer Fehlschlag Du sabotierst deine eigene Argumentation. Reduziere Mengkares Zweifelwert um 1.

Costar.name: Gemeinsam auftreten
Costar.description:
Auslöser Ein anderer Schausteller im gleichen Akt legt einen Trickwurf ab.

Anforderungen Der Schausteller ist bereit, deine Unterstützung zu akzeptieren.

Du hilfst einem anderen Schausteller im Akt bei seinem Trick; dies verleiht ihm möglicherweise einen Bonus auf den auslösenden Trickwurf. Lege den selben Trickwurf mit dem gleichen SG wie der unterstützte Schausteller ab. NSC können diese Reaktion nicht nutzen; ansonsten funktioniert diese Reaktion wie die Aktion @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.HCl3pzVefiv9ZKQW]{Jemand anderem helfen}.

Cram.name: Cram
Cram.description:
Requirements You are an initiate, attendant, or conversant, and your branch level for either your primary or secondary branch is 2 or more levels below the limit.

Realizing that you're falling behind in your studies, you cram more than you probably should. You Study twice, each in a branch that satisfies the activity requirements. However, the extra studying comes at a price. Until the next time you take the Study downtime activity, you're particularly tired from all the extra hours cramming; at the start of each day of adventuring, you must succeed at a @Check[flat|dc:8] check or be @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.HL2l2VRSaQHu9lUw]{Fatigued} for that day.

Creative Spark.name: Kreativer Funken
Creative Spark.description:
Aspekt Schmiede

Aktivierung 2 Befehl, Interagieren

Häufigkeit Einmal am Tag

Effekt Schlage das Relikt gegen ein Stück Feuerstein und beschwöre einen @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.pathfinder-bestiary-3.Actor.9KZRWATLOGP7QGyM]{Feuerwysp} als Helfer. Der Feuerwysp erscheint in einem freien Feld neben dir. Er kann im Kampf nicht handeln, wohl aber dir beim Herstellen von Gegenständen helfen. Du erlangst einen Bonus von +1 auf Würfe für Handwerkskunst, sofern es um Grobschmiedearbeiten und allgemeine Metallbearbeitung geht. Der Bonus steigt mit der 9. Stufe auf +2 und mit der 17. Stufe auf +3. Einmal am Tag kannst du einen Kritischen Fehlschlag bei einem solchen Wurf für Handwerkskunst als normalen Fehlschlag behandeln. Solange dir der Wysp hilft, benötigst du keine Schmiede zum Arbeiten, wohl aber sonstige erforderliche Ausrüstung und Werkzeuge. Der Wysp verbleibt 10 Minuten lang bei dir, sofern du den Effekt nicht vorher Aufhebst. Du kannst den Effekt um weitere 10 Minuten verlängern, indem du wenigstens 1 Lasteinheit an Holzkohle oder Feuerholz oder einen halben Liter Öl an den Wysp verfütterst.

Cunning Disguise.name: Clevere Verkleidung
Cunning Disguise.description:
Overcome @Check[deception|dc:35] or DC 33 (see below)

The PCs conceal their true identities, relying on false personas to be admitted onto the estate. A PC can use a skill closely connected to their chosen disguise in place of Deception, such as Intimidation for a guard, Guild Lore for a merchant, or any food-related Lore for a caterer.

If a PC succeeds at a Cunning Disguise, roll a secret @Check[perception|dc:34|traits:secret] for them to notice something off about one of the guests. On a success, inform them about the Dispel a Disguise Opportunity.

Dancing Shadow.name: Tanzender Schatten
Dancing Shadow.description:
Aspekt Schatten

Voraussetzung Das Relikt ist eine Waffe.

Aktivieren 2 Befehl, Interagieren

Häufigkeit einmal pro Stunde

Effekt Der Schatten des Relikts löst sich von dem Relikt und tanzt durch die Luft, um einen Feind anzugreifen. Wenn man das Relikt aktiviert, bestimmt man ein Ziel. Der Schatten des Relikts fliegt bis zu 60 Fuß/18 m hoch, bis er an diesen Feind angrenzt und führt einen Angriff gegen ihn aus. Bei einem Erfolg verursacht es [[/r 5d8]]{5W8 Punkte Schaden}, doppelten Schaden bei einem kritischen Erfolg. Die Art des Schadens entspricht der normalerweise durch das Relikt verursachten Schadensart. Der Schatten nutzt den Angriffsbonus des Reliktträgers. Die Angriffe des Reliktes zählen zu dem Malus für Mehrfachangriffe des Trägers. Während diese Aktivierung in Kraft ist, kann man mit einer einzigen Aktion, welche die Eigenschaften Angriff und Konzentration aufweist, den Schatten mental so lenken, dass er einen weiteren Schlag gegen dasselbe Ziel ausführt. Der Schatten hält so lange an, bis das Ziel auf 0 Trefferpunkte reduziert ist, das Ziel sich mehr als 400 Fuß/120 m vom Träger wegbewegt oder das Ziel sich in einen Bereich bewegt, in dem kein Schatten geworfen werden kann, wie z.B. in einen Bereich völliger Dunkelheit, je nachdem, was zuerst eintritt.

De-Animating Gestures (False).name: De-Animating Gestures (False)
De-Animating Gestures (False).description: You designate a single construct within 30 feet that you can see or hear. The construct becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.nlCjDvLMf2EkV2dl]{Quickened 1} for 1 minute and is temporarily immune to this ability for 24 hours. It can use its additional action only to Stride or Strike.

De-Animating Gestures (True).name: De-Animating Gestures (True)
De-Animating Gestures (True).description: You designate a single construct within 30 feet that you can see or hear. The construct is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 1} for 1 minute.

Deadly Spark.name: Tödlicher Funke
Deadly Spark.description:
Aspect air

Activate 2 command, Interact

Effect A spark flashes out from the relic toward a creature within 20 feet. This spark deals @Damage[1d12[electricity]] damage (@Check[reflex|against:class-spell|basic] save). The damage increases by 1d12 at 6th level and by another 1d12 every 4 levels thereafter.

[[/r (1+max(0,floor((@actor.level -2)/4)))d12[electricity]]]{Leveled electricity damage}

Deadly Traps.name: Todesfallen
Deadly Traps.description:
Overcome 2 successes; @Check[arcana|dc:34] or @Check[thievery|dc:34]

The PCs suppress or disable dangerous traps set to kill would-be thieves and make an explosive ruckus.

Special If a PC fails a check to overcome this scene, they trigger a trap that deals @Damage[16d6[untyped]] damage to that PC (@Check[reflex|dc:36|basic]). If the PC critically fails, it deals this damage to all PCs in the scene.

Deduce Traditions.name: Wertvorstellungen einschätzen
Deduce Traditions.description:
By interpreting a regent's personality, drawing upon what you know about dwarven tradition, and making educated guesses, you surmise what sorts of skills are most valued by the dwarven regent's guild-and thus infer what types of skills would most likely curry that regent's favor. Deduce Traditions requires a successful @Check[perception|dc:30] or a successful @Check[society|dc:25] check to yield accurate results.

Critical Success You learn one of the guild's favored skills and learn what that regent's Skepticism value is.

Success You learn one of the guild's favored skills.

Failure You learn none of the guild's favored skills.

Critical Failure You learn an incorrect favored skill.

Dispel a Disguise.name: Verkleidung aufdecken
Dispel a Disguise.description:
Requirement When Blending In or using a Cunning Disguise, a PC has noticed something is off about a guest.

Overcome @Check[arcana|dc:35], @Check[occultism|dc:33], @Check[perception|dc:37]

The PC is sure there's more to Baroness Epminia Fahlspar than meets the eye. They're right-she's Reloon, a rakshasa in disguise!

Critical Success The PC sees through the disguise and identifies a way to unveil the rakshasa without magic. Rakshasas are not unwelcome here, but the sudden reveal of Reloon's natural form and her dismayed outburst draws the attention of many partyers. Reduce Awareness by 2 (minimum 0).

Success The PC senses the magical disguise. To overcome this Opportunity, a PC must either magically counteract the disguise or succeed at a @Check[deception|dc:40] or @Check[intimidation|dc:40] check to cause the baroness's concentration to waver, briefly disrupting her disguise. This reveals her, as described under critical success.

Failure The PC sees no evidence of a disguise.

Critical Failure The PC sees no evidence of a disguise, and their scrutiny invites a loud dressing down by the baroness.

Distract Guards.name: Wachen ablenken
Distract Guards.description:
You attempt to distract a specific group of guards away from their patrol route or their post. You can do so by attempting a @Check[deception|dc:41] check, or by using a spell effect, in which case you attempt a @Check[arcana|dc:41], @Check[nature|dc:41], @Check[occultism|dc:41], or @Check[religion|dc:41] check (as appropriate) to determine success. Each attempt to Distract Guards takes a minute to play out-from the initial distraction to the guard's reaction.

Critical Success You significantly distract the guards away from their patrol area or post to an area in the citadel of your choice. The guards return to their original post after 1 hour has passed.

Success You distract the guards away from their patrol area or post to an area in the citadel of your choice. The guards return to their original post after 20 minutes have passed.

Failure You fail to distract the guards. Any attempt made in the next 10 minutes to distract the same guards takes a -2 penalty to the check.

Critical Failure As failure above, but the guards realize you're trying to distract them and escort you out of the building. If this is your third critical failure against that particular group of guards, the guard instead places you under arrest.

Divine Retribution.name: Göttliche Vergeltung
Divine Retribution.description:
Aspekt Celestisch

Voraussetzungen Das Relikt ist eine Waffe.

Aktivieren 2 Befehl

Effekt Aus göttlicher Wut heraus sucht man sich ein Ziel, das einem selbst oder einem Verbündeten in der vergangenen Runde geschadet hat, und füllt sein Relikt mit göttlicher Rache gegen dieses. Man führt einen Angriff gegen diesen Feind aus und verursacht bei einem Treffer einen zusätzlichen Schadenswürfel. Wenn das Ziel böse ist, erleidet es bis zum Beginn des nächsten Zuges bei einem Treffer den Zustand @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Kraftlos 1} (oder @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Kraftlos 2} bei einem kritischen Treffer).

Diviner on Duty.name: Erkenntnismagierin im Dienst
Diviner on Duty.description:
Trigger A PC uses magic to aid in overcoming an Obstacle during infiltration.

Overcome 3 successes: @Check[arcana|dc:35], @Check[deception|dc:37], @Check[nature|dc:35], @Check[occultism|dc:35], @Check[religion|dc:35]

Among the Scarlet Triad's security is a highly competent diviner! With spells such as @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.uNsliWpl8Q1JdFcM]{Discern Lies}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.KHnhPHL4x1AQHfbC]{Mind Reading}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.jwK43yKsHTkJQvQ9]{See the Unseen}, and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.uqlxMQQeSGWEVjki]{Truesight}, this diviner can see through most magical schemes the PCs might use.

The diviner is watching for magical threats, not poison. With a successful @Check[deception|dc:33], @Check[thievery|dc:33], or food-related Lore check, a PC can trick her into consuming something laden with an ingested poison. Her Fortitude save bonus is [[/r (1d20+23) #Fortitude Saving Throw]]{+23}, and she withdraws if successfully poisoned. If not successfully poisoned, increase the PCs' Awareness Points by 2.

Dream Research.name: Traumforschung
Dream Research.description:
Auslöser Du schläfst innerhalb von 5 Meilen/7,50 km um die Villa Xarwin ein

Häufigkeit Einmal alle 12 Stunden

Während deines Schlafs sind deine Träume schiere Albträume. In diesen Träumen driftet dein Verstand von deiner Seele ab, und all dein Wissen fühlt sich an, als würde es in die dunklen Orte zwischen den Sternen hinaufgezogen, um dort verschlungen zu werden. Während des Traums kannst du dich auf ein Forschungsthema konzentrieren, das du noch nicht vollständig erforscht hast. Wenn du ein Thema wählst, für das die Gruppe bereits alle Forschungsschwellen entdeckt hat, kannst du sofort zu einem anderen Thema wechseln.

Sowohl zu verwendende Fertigkeit als auch der SG hängen von dem Thema ab. Der jeweilige Ort, an welchem das Thema erforscht werden kann, gibt beides vor. Solltest du außerhalb des Geländes der Villa träumen, ist die Verbindung zur Bosheit abgeschwächt und du erleidest einen Zustandsmalus von -2 auf diesen Fertigkeitswurf.

Kritischer Erfolg Du erhältst 2 FoP

Erfolg Du erhältst 1 FoP

Kritischer Fehlschlag Du schaust zu tief in die Bosheit, welche deinen Blick auf sich spürt. Du schaffst es zwar, die mentale Verbindung zu unterbrechen, bevor du einige Erinnerungen an ihren Hunger verlierst, erhöhst jedoch den Wert deines Zustands Bosheit um 1.

Ease Burden.name: Last erleichtern
Ease Burden.description:
Aspekt Erde

Das Relikt zieht Kraft aus der Erde unter den Füßen, um die Last zu erleichtern. Solange sich das Relikt auf dem Boden befindet und man auf dem Boden steht, kann man 1 Last mehr als normal tragen, bevor man belastet wird. Man erhöht die maximale Last um 2. Auf der 6. und danach alle 4 folgenden Stufen erhöhen man die Last, die man tragen kann, bevor man belastet wird, um 1 und seine maximale Last um 2.

Elemental Attack.name: Elemental Attack
Elemental Attack.description: Choose from air, earth, fire, metal, water, or wood (this choice can't be changed once you select it for the impersonator). The noppera-bo impersonator targets a creature within 60 feet and creates a detonation of that element; that creature takes @Damage[4d6[@item.flags.pf2e.rulesSelections.damage]] (slashing (air), bludgeoning (earth, water, or wood), piercing (metal), or fire (fire)) damage (@Check[reflex|dc:24|basic] save). Elemental Attack gains the appropriate elemental trait.

Elements of Creation.name: Elemente der Schöpfung
Elements of Creation.description:
Aspekt Schmiede

Voraussetzung Kreativer Funken

Wenn du Kreativer Funken aktivierst, kannst du wählen, neben dem Feuerwysp zusätzlich einen @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.pathfinder-bestiary-3.Actor.OPRuZ1cEuKkJGPMV]{Erdwysp}, einen @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.pathfinder-bestiary-3.Actor.0HTju4vf8ADAAh2g]{Luftwysp} und einen @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.pathfinder-bestiary-3.Actor.YX0CqhKKtRzoLkuP]{Wasserwysp} in freie Felder neben dir zu beschwören. Im Gegensatz zu normalen Erdwysps nimmt der beschworene Erdwysp die Gestalt einer kleinen Kreatur aus Eisen an und ähnelt einer Kreuzung aus Amboss und Hirschkäfer. Wie der Feuerwysp agieren auch diese Wyspe nicht im Kampf, sondern helfen dir beim Herstellen von Gegenständen. Helfen alle vier, so wird der Bonus aus Kreativer Funken verdoppelt und werden die Ergebnisse deiner Würfe für Handwerkskunst zum Grobschmieden als um einen Erfolgsschritt besser behandeln. Die Hilfe aller vier Wyspe ersetzt ferner alle benötigte Ausrüstung außer Grobschmiedewerkzeugen, wenn du Metallgegenstände herstellst. Die Wyspe verweilen 10 Minuten lang, sofern du nicht vorher den Effekt Aufhebst und so alle zusammen fortschickst. Falls du die Wirkungsdauer durch Füttern des Feuerwysps verlängerst, verlängert sich auch die Aufenthaltsdauer der anderen Wyspe.

Erect Barricades.name: Barrikaden errichten
Erect Barricades.description:
Open gaps in the walls, in alleys, or even on streets can be fortified with barricades to prevent easy passage into town, using lumber, trees, barrels, wagons, rubbish, and even sharpened poles. Erecting a Barricade requires a Crafting check. This activity can be performed by more than one PC to create more than one barricade.

Critical Success The barricade is a success. When a defending army takes the Guard action, it gains a +2 item bonus on its Maneuver check. A barricade can grant this bonus only twice before it is ruined by enemy attacks.

Success As critical success, but the barricade only works for one Guard action.

Critical Failure A catastrophic accident occurs! Not only is the barricade ruined, but the PC attempting to erect the barricade takes @Damage[10d6[bludgeoning]] damage (@Check[reflex|dc:25|basic]).

Exhale Poison.name: Gift ausatmen
Exhale Poison.description:
Anforderungen Du warst innerhalb der letzten Minute im Wirkungsbereich eines Gifts der Kategorie Eingeatmet; @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.8PMxl8o5YXET58Pn]{Eisenlunge}

Häufigkeit Einmal pro Stunde

Du atmest das Gift, das dich vorher umgab, scharf in einen @Template[type:cone|distance:15]{4,50 m-Kegel} aus. Alle Kreaturen im Wirkungsbereich werden vom Gift betroffen; der SG und Effekt des Gifts bleiben unverändert.

Explore the Electric Castle.name: Explore the Electric Castle
Explore the Electric Castle.description:
Rare

You make your way around and explore an area in Aslynn's fortress. When you Explore the Electric Castle, attempt a skill check, choosing from the skills indicated in the area you're searching. Other Lore checks might be appropriate at the GM's discretion. The DC of most skill checks is 23 (DC 26 for levels 9-10); for checks using an appropriate Lore skill, lower the DC to 20 (DC 23 for levels 9-10). You can @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.aBQ8ajvEBByv45yz]{Cast a Spell} instead of attempting a skill check. If you use a non-cantrip spell appropriate to the task, you earn a success; if the spell is at least 3rd rank (or 4th rank for levels 9-10), you instead earn a critical success. Examples of spells you can cast include invisibility or obscuring mist to help sneak, shape wood or shape stone to open a passage, or spider climb or dimension door to maneuver around difficult areas. Based on the results of your check, determine how long it takes to get to and explore the room.

Critical Success You reduce the time it takes by 5 minutes (to a minimum of 15 minutes).

Success You do not increase the time it takes.

Failure You increase the time it takes by 5 minutes.

Critical Failure You increase the time it takes by 10 minutes (to a maximum of 1 hour).

Explore the Vault of Boundless Wonder.name: Explore the Vault of Boundless Wonder
Explore the Vault of Boundless Wonder.description:
Searching an area of the vault takes about 10 minutes. When you Explore the Vault of Boundless Wonder, attempt a skill check, choosing from the skills indicated in the area you're searching. Other Lore checks might be appropriate at the GM's discretion. The DC of most skill checks is 15 (DC 18 for levels 3-4); for checks using an appropriate Lore skill, lower the DC to 12 (DC 15 for levels 3-4). The overwhelming presence of magic in the vault makes detect magic and similar magic less accurate than usual, but if you use such spells, you gain a +1 status bonus to your check. Based on the results of your check, you might discover something useful.

Critical Success You make a significant discovery in the area you're searching.

Success You make a discovery in the area you're searching.

Critical Failure You make a mistaken discovery in the area you're searching.

Feral Claws.name: Bestienklauen
Feral Claws.description:
Aspekt Bestie

Voraussetzungen Das Relikt ist ein Getragener Gegenstand

Aktivierung 1 (Konzentration)

Effekt Deine Hände verwandeln sich in ein Klauenpaar. Diese verleihen dir einen Waffenlosen Klauenangriff, der 1W6 Punkte Hiebschaden verursacht und die Kategorien Agil und Finesse. Der Effekt währt, bis du ihn Aufhebst.

Fey Luck.name: Feenglück
Fey Luck.description:
Auslöser Dir misslingt ein Rettungswurf (normaler oder Kritischer Fehlschlag).

Häufigkeit Einmal

Das dir für die Befreiung der Pixies aus den grausamen Käfigen verliehene Glück rettet dich vor einem unerwünschten Schicksal. Ein gewöhnlicher Fehlschlag wird zu einem normalen Erfolg, ein Kritischer Fehlschlag wird zu einen normalen Fehlschlag.

Fight Fires.name: Feuer löschen
Fight Fires.description:
You attempt to put out flames by kicking apart burning debris, smothering smaller fires, or moving unburnt items out of the path of flames. Attempt a @Check[acrobatics|dc:15], @Check[athletics|dc:15], or @Check[survival|dc:15] check to determine the level of your success. If you use water as part of this action, you gain a +2 item bonus to this check. Alternately, you can use a spell to Fight Fires by attempting a spell attack roll as you Cast, although you'll need to describe how you're using the spell to the GM, who will then decide if the plan has a chance to succeed. If the spell has the Water trait, you gain a +2 circumstance bonus to this check. Certain spells, at the GM's discretion, may automatically grant a critical success or instantly extinguish the flames.

Critical Success You gain 2 Extinguish Points.

Success You gain 1 Extinguish Point.

Critical Failure You lose 1 Extinguish Point.

Fight the Fire.name: Feuer löschen
Fight the Fire.description:
You work to contain the fire. Attempt a @Check[acrobatics|dc:36] check to move quickly through the building and extinguish burning areas opportunistically, a @Check[athletics|dc:38] check to remove debris to prevent the spread of fire or haul buckets of water or sand to extinguish flames, or a @Check[diplomacy|dc:40] or @Check[intimidation|dc:40] check to organize bystanders into helping fight the fire.

Critical Success You make significant progress, allowing [[/r 1d6]]{1d6 citizens} to escape to safety on their own, and no citizens still trapped in the building perish at the end of the phase. Any checks to Rescue Citizens for the remainder of this phase gain a +2 circumstance bonus. Increase the number of phases remaining before the building collapses by 1.

Success You curtail flames in areas where citizens are still trapped. No citizens still trapped in the building perish at the end of the phase. Any checks to Rescue Citizens for the remainder of this phase gain a +1 circumstance bonus.

Failure You take @Damage[4d6[fire]] damage.

Critical Failure Your attempts to Fight the Fire accidentally spread the flames instead. You take @Damage[8d6[fire]] damage. Reduce the number of phases remaining before the building collapses by 1.

Find the Cells.name: Findet die Zellen
Find the Cells.description:
Overcome 3 successes; @Check[architecture-lore|dc:33], @Check[perception|dc:35], @Check[survival|dc:35]

The PCs identify an efficient route through the manor and reach the holding cells and vaults in the basement-all without opening too many doors, making too much noise, or wasting time searching for secret doors.

Fire the Cannons! (3-4).name: Fire the Cannons! (3-4)
Fire the Cannons! (3-4).description:
You help the Unsinkable's crew to fire the ship's cannons at the manifestation of Qxal. The cannons can fire either cannonballs or harpoons at a range of 100 feet. Attempt an [[/r {1d20+17} #Attack roll]]{attack roll with a +17 bonus} against the manifestation.

Critical Success As a success, but the manifestation takes double damage. If hit by a harpoon, the manifestation is pulled 30 feet toward the Unsinkable.

Success The manifestation takes @Damage[(2d8+9)[bludgeoning]] damage if hit by a cannonball or takes @Damage[(1d8+4)[piercing]] damage and is pulled 15 feet toward the Unsinkable if hit by a harpoon.

Failure The attack deals no damage.

Critical Failure The attack deals no damage and the cannon can't be fired again on the next round.

Fire the Cannons! (5-6).name: Fire the Cannons! (5-6)
Fire the Cannons! (5-6).description:
You help the Unsinkable's crew to fire the ship's cannons at the manifestation of Qxal. The cannons can fire either cannonballs or harpoons at a range of 100 feet. Attempt an [[/r {1d20+17} #Attack roll]]{attack roll with a +17 bonus} against the manifestation.

Critical Success As a success, but the manifestation takes double damage. If hit by a harpoon, the manifestation is pulled 30 feet toward the Unsinkable.

Success The manifestation takes @Damage[(4d8+7)[bludgeoning]] damage if hit by a cannonball or takes @Damage[(2d8+3)[piercing]] damage and is pulled 15 feet toward the Unsinkable if hit by a harpoon.

Failure The attack deals no damage.

Critical Failure The attack deals no damage and the cannon can't be fired again on the next round.

Flare Bolt.name: Leuchtgeschoss
Flare Bolt.description:
Aspekt Feuer

Aktivierung 2 (Handhaben, Konzentration)

Effekt Ein Geschoss aus Flammen schießt aus dem Relikt heraus. Führe mit dem Relikt einen Zauberangriffswurf gegen ein Ziel innerhalb von 30 Fuß/9 m Entfernung aus. Das Geschoss verursacht @Damage[1d6[fire]]{1W6 Punkte Feuerschaden} für jeweils 2 Stufen des Relikts (mindestens 1W6).

Kritischer Erfolg Das Geschoss verursacht doppelten Schaden sowie Anhaltenden Feuerschaden in Höhe der Stufe des Relikts.

Erfolg Das Geschoss verursacht den vollen Schaden.

Forge Documents.name: Dokumente fälschen
Forge Documents.description:
Overcome @Check[society|dc:34]

The PC prepares several forgeries that might serve as convincing props during the heist.

Success The PC creates convincing documents that grant the PCs 1 Edge Point they can use when presenting proper credentials, work orders, or invitations.

Failure The PC creates somewhat unconvincing documents. Inform the PCs the forgeries grant 1 Edge Point. However, when they use that Edge Point, it grants no benefit.

Critical Failure As failure, but a PC who uses the Edge Point on a failure gets a critical failure instead.

Forgive Foe.name: Gegner vergeben
Forgive Foe.description:
You make an attempt to force a foe to confront its guilt and face its shame for its actions. When you do so, attempt either a @Check[diplomacy|defense:will] check or another check as indicated in the creature's Shame entry; the DC is the creature's Will DC.

Critical Success Your words strike home and allow the creature to escape its servitude to the House at the Edge of Time. The specific effects of this are listed in the creature's Shame entry.

Success Your words give the foe pause. It suffers a -2 status penalty on all attacks, effect DCs, and its Will DC against additional Forgive Foe attempts until the end of your next turn.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.campaign-effects.Item.tWFcPYueuOdSgSgg]{Effect: Forgive Foe}

Critical Failure Your attempt fails so dramatically that you instead fuel the creature's wrath and effectively blind it to its sense of shame and guilt. For the next 24 hours, it no longer suffers the effects of shame when it attacks you and you can no longer attempt to Forgive that Foe.

Form of Fury.name: Zorngestalt
Form of Fury.description:
Aspekt Bestie

Anforderungen Das Relikt ist ein getragener Gegenstand.

Aktivierung 2 (Konzentration)

Häufigkeit Zweimal am Tag

Effekt Indem du dich auf deine innere Bestie konzentrierst, verwandelst du dich in die Gestalt eines Tieres. Das Relikt wirkt @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.wp09USMB3GIW1qbp]{Tiergestalt} und verwandelt dich jedes Mal in dieselbe Tierart, die bei der Erlangung der Gabe gewählt wird; der Zauberstufe ist die halbe Gegenstandsstufe (abgerundet).

Guild Investigation.name: Ermittlungen innerhalb der Gilde
Guild Investigation.description:
Ein SC wendet einen Tag auf und legt einen Fertigkeitswurf gegen SG 30 ab, um Ermittlungen zu betreiben.

Kritischer Erfolg Die Ermittlungen führen zu überzeugenden Beweisen, dass Brigven der Verantwortliche ist, zudem erfahren die SC, wo seine Werkstatt ist. Sowie die SC ihn mit der Beweislage konfrontieren, gesteht Brigven alles.

Erfolg Die Ermittlungen legen nahe, dass Brigven der Verantwortliche ist, zudem erfahren die SC, wo seine Werkstatt ist.

Fehlschlag Die Ermittlungen laufen ins Leere, aber wenigstens erfährt auch Brigven nichts davon.

Kritischer Fehlschlag Die Ermittlungen laufen ins Leere. Brigven erfährt zudem, dass die SC hinter ihm her sind. Er setzt sich in die Verborgene Schmiede ab, um Zuflucht bei den anderen Droskarkultisten zu finden. In diesem Fall können die SC ihn in Bereich D2 antreffen (nutze dieselben Spielwerte wie für Thea).

Haul Supplies.name: Lebensmittel heranschleppen
Haul Supplies.description:
You pack up as many supplies as you can carry and make your way back to Bazal's Basin with food and water. Attempt a @Check[athletics|dc:34] check to determine the amount and quality of the food you manage to haul and keep safe from being damaged in the storm. A character who uses powerful magic (such as teleport) to aid in transporting the food automatically achieves a result one category higher than they roll.

Critical Success You return with 15 Bulk of supplies.

Success You return with 10 Bulk of supplies.

Failure Some of the food was damaged in transport, and you return with only 5 Bulk of supplies.

Critical Failure All of the supplies you attempted to transport are ruined.

Heat Haze.name: Hitzeflimmern
Heat Haze.description:
Aspekt Feuer

Die Hitze des Relikts hält die Luft um dich herum angenehm warm. Während du das Relikt in der Hand hältst oder am Leib trägst, schützt es dich vor Ernsthafter Umgebungskälte. Auf der 9. Stufe schützt es dich auch vor Extremer Kälte und auf der 17. Stufe schützt es dich vor Unglaublicher Kälte. Auf der 4. Stufe erhält das Relikt auch die folgende Aktivierung:

Aktivierung 2 (Konzentration)

Häufigkeit Einmal am Tag

Effekt Das Relikt erhöht die Lufttemperatur um dich herum unregelmäßig, wodurch Hitzeflimmern entsteht, welches dein Aussehen verzerrt und dir für 1 Minute den Zustand @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Verborgen} gewährt. Da die Art dieses Effekts den eigenen Standort immer noch offensichtlich macht, kannst du diesen Zustand nicht zum @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.VMozDqMMuK5kpoX4]{Schleichen} oder @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.XMcnh4cSI32tljXa]{Verstecken} verwenden.

Holy Light.name: Heiliges Licht
Holy Light.description:
Aspekt Celestisch

Aktivieren 2 Befehl, Interagieren

Effekt Das Relikt leuchtet mit heiligem Licht. Dies erzeugt helles Licht in einer @Template[type:emanation|distance:30]{30 Fuß/9-m- Ausstrahlung} um den Gegenstand herum. Böse Kreaturen in dem Bereich erhalten den Zustand @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Verängstigt 1} und können diesen Zustandswert nicht unter 1 senken, solange sie im Licht bleiben. Scheusale in dem Gebiet erhöhen jede vorhandene Schwäche für heiligen Schaden um 5. Man kann diese Aktivierung bis zu 1 Minute lang aufrechterhalten.

Host Event.name: Veranstaltung organisieren
Host Event.description:
You dedicate a day to planning and hosting a special event, such as a feast, a small festival, or a public performance. Doing so requires an expenditure of 250 gp. Attempt a @Check[diplomacy|dc:36], @Check[performance|dc:36], @Check[society|dc:36], or appropriate Lore check. The result determines the impact of your efforts. You gain a cumulative +1 circumstance bonus to this check (maximum +4) for each additional 250 gp you spend on the event.

Critical Success Each PC gains a +2 circumstance bonus to skill checks to perform downtime activities for the next 3 days. Also, reduce the Support Points of two different guilds of your choice by 1.

Success Each PC gains a +1 circumstance bonus to skill checks to perform downtime activities the following day. In addition, reduce the Support Points of one guild of your choice by 1.

Critical Failure The party is a disaster. Each PC takes a -2 circumstance penalty to skill checks to perform downtime activities the following day.

Hunt the Animals.name: Tiere jagen
Hunt the Animals.description:
When the hunt begins, the Ekujae elves and the PCs work together to bring down the game.

  • Against an impressive find, each PC actively participating (and not just Aiding) attempts a @Check[survival|dc:25] check
  • Against standard game, @Check[survival|dc:20] check
  • No check is needed to hunt river turtles or bats—hunting such game is automatically successful (but can never be a critical success).

Critical Success You help take down the animals quickly and relatively painlessly, showing them mercy.

Success Your participation in the hunt helps the hunting party take down the animals quickly.

Failure Your involvement complicates the hunt-one or two animals even escape uninjured. Each PC takes [[/r 2d6]] damage from animal attacks (or [[/r 4d6]] if the animals were an impressive find).

Critical Failure Several of the animals die poorly, and many escape with mortal wounds. Barely enough animals are caught for the feast, but the fact that they died in pain or escaped with injuries shames the Ekujae-the party loses 2 IP. Each PC takes [[/r (2d6+6)]] damage from animal attacks (or [[/r (4d6+12)]] if the animals were an impressive find).

Influence Guild.name: Gilde beeinflussen
Influence Guild.description:
Du wendest einen Tag auf, um dich mit Angehörigen einer bestimmten Gilde anzufreunden, der Organisation zu helfen und die Gildenmitglieder dazu zu überzeugen, die Blutrote Triade nicht zu unterstützen. Lege einen Fertigkeitswurf gegen SG 34 für eine der bevorzugten Fertigkeiten der Gilde ab.

Kritischer Erfolg Reduziere die Unterstützungspunkte dieser Organisation um 3.

Erfolg Reduziere die Unterstützungspunkte dieser Organisation um 1.

Kritischer Fehlschlag Erhöhe die Unterstützungspunkte dieser Organisation um 1.

Influence Regent.name: Regent beeinflussen
Influence Regent.description:
You attempt to gain favor with one of Kovlar's regents, either by responding to their question with tact and respect and attempting a Diplomacy check, or by drawing upon your acumen in another skill. This second tactic usually can't succeed unless that skill is one favored by that regent's guild. At the GM's option, you may substitute an applicable Lore skill check for the Diplomacy check. If you attempt a Diplomacy or Lore check, it's a @Check[diplomacy|dc:32] or @Check[lore|dc:32] check for success; if you attempt a favored skill check, it's a @Check[diplomacy|dc:28] or @Check[lore|dc:28] check for success.

At the GM's option, a player who brings up a compelling point or roleplays particularly well in their attempt to Influence a Regent might gain a +2 circumstance bonus on the check.

Critical Success You reduce the regent's Skepticism by 2.

Success You reduce the regent's Skepticism by 1.

Failure You do not adjust the regent's Skepticism.

Critical Failure You increase the regent's Skepticism by 1.

Investigate Chamber.name: Raum untersuchen
Investigate Chamber.description:
You take 10 minutes to investigate a specific room in the Golden Citadel to learn any information about it. Guards won't normally be annoyed by this if you investigate a public area, but if they see you investigating a private area they will attempt to escort you out before you can complete the investigation. Attempt a @Check[perception|dc:36] to determine your level of success.

Critical Success You learn the room's read-aloud text, basic information, and any secret information.

Success You learn the room's read-aloud text and basic information.

Failure You fail to learn anything about the room other than its read-aloud text.

Critical Failure As failure above, but any guards who can observe you notice suspicious activity and attempt to escort you out of the area, either to the council chamber or out of the building entirely.

Invoke Eiseth.name: Eiseth beschwören
Invoke Eiseth.description:
Frequency once per round

Effect You attempt to demoralize Lorthact by invoking his nemesis. Attempt a @Check[deception|dc:33], @Check[intimidation|dc:33], @Check[performance|dc:33], or @Check[religion|dc:33] check. Regardless of your result, Lorthact is temporarily immune to your further attempts to Invoke Eiseth for 10 minutes, though not the attempts of others.

Critical Success Lorthact becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 2} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 1}.

Success Lorthact becomes frightened 2.

Failure Lorthact becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 1}.

Critical Failure Your floundering attempt backfires and instead amuses Lorthact; he is temporarily immune to all attempts to Invoke Eiseth until the end of your next turn.

Issue Challenge.name: Herausforderung aussprechen
Issue Challenge.description:
You spend a day promoting your combat abilities, trash-talking the competition, calling out the leadership of the Gladiators' Guild, or performing public feats of bravado to compel the guildmaster of the Gladiators' Guild to accept your challenge to rule over the arena. This action ties specifically into Task 3: Blood on the Sand. Attempt a @Check[athletics|dc:36], @Check[deception|dc:36], @Check[intimidation|dc:36], @Check[performance|dc:36], or appropriate Lore skill check.

Critical Success You provoke Bshez Shak into accepting your challenge.

Success You weaken Bshez's resolve. For the next 7 days, your checks to Issue Challenges gain a cumulative +1 circumstance bonus (maximum +4).

Critical Failure Your boisterousness accidentally leads to embarrassment that undermines your stature. You lose any circumstance bonuses you've earned as a result of successful Issued Challenges, and can't Issue a Challenge the next day.

Kick Dust.name: Kick Dust
Kick Dust.description:
Requirements You're standing in an area with ample loose soil.

By scooping and kicking with your foot, you launch a cloud of dust into an adjacent space. Attempt a @Check[acrobatics|dc:15] or @Check[athletics|dc:15] check. The size of the cloud depends on your check result.

Critical Success The cloud fills a @Template[type:cone|distance:15]. Creatures in the cone are covered in dust for 2 rounds, and dust-covered creatures are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Concealed} rather than @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.zJxUflt9np0q4yML]{Invisible}. As an action, a creature can attempt a @Check[reflex|dc:15] save to shake off the dust.

Success As critical success, but the cloud fills a @Template[type:cone|distance:10].

Failure You kick an insignificant amount of dust.

Critical Failure You misjudge your kick, causing you to stumble and become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard} until the beginning of your next turn.

Linguistic Nexus.name: Linguistischer Nexus
Linguistic Nexus.description:
Aspekt Verstand

Das Relikt verleiht einem eine mächtige geistige Geschmeidigkeit, was den Träger in die Lage versetzt, neue Sprachen leichter zu erlernen. Man lernt eine zusätzliche Sprache seiner Wahl für jeweils 2 Stufen des Relikt (mindestens 1). Man kann durch das Relikt eine seiner Sprachen mit nur einer einzigen Woche Auszeit Umlernen.

Liralarue's Glimpse.name: Liralarue's Glimpse
Liralarue's Glimpse.description:
Frequency once per day

Trigger You fail or critically fail a saving throw or attack roll.

Requirements You aren't stupefied.

You suddenly realize that what you thought was a catastrophic failure on your part was actually a supernaturally realistic vision from your immediate future. Reroll the saving throw or attack roll that triggered this reaction. If you fail the reroll, you instead succeed. If you critically fail the reroll, you instead merely fail the roll.

Although you can use Liralarue's Glimpse once per day, if you use this reaction more than once a week, your abuse of these glimpses of the future causes you to also glimpse dreadful, unavoidable pains and dooms that you'll certainly experience in the future. These glimpses provide no additional aid or benefit, but their distracting nature causes you to become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied 1} and prevents you from using Liralarue's Glimpse again for 7 days.

Little Ripple's Blessing.name: Little Ripple's Blessing
Little Ripple's Blessing.description:
Frequency once

You tap into your bond with Little Ripple to temporarily manifest the water elemental. A sphere of semi-tangible water surrounds you, which magically purifies your spirit and purges toxins from your body. Little Ripple attempts to counteract a single disease or poison you are affected by with a counteract modifier of [[/r 1d20+21 #Counteract]]{+21} and a counteract rank of 10. Little Ripple's presence has a soothing effect on your spirit. You gain a +1 status bonus to Will saves for 1 minute.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.campaign-effects.Item.GBaN8XZrzFp7C7fL]{Effect: Little Ripple's Blessing}

Locked Doors.name: Verschlossene Türen
Locked Doors.description:
Overcome 2 successes; @Check[athletics|dc:35],@Check[thievery|dc:35]

Most of the manor is locked to prevent guests from wandering into restricted areas. The PCs quietly break into rooms or unlock doors.

Loot the Vaults.name: Die Schatzkammern plündern
Loot the Vaults.description:
Requirement The PCs have reached the basement by Overcoming the Find the Cells Obstacle.

Overcome 2 successes: @Check[arcana|dc:33], @Check[perception|dc:35], @Check[thievery|dc:35]

In addition to the captives, the Scarlet Triad has stored numerous treasures in the manor's basement. The PCs take several minutes to unlock a vault and identify the best objects to steal. This Opportunity can be completed twice. The first time, the PCs recover a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.EKXRigmEZgqmFA62]{Nethysian Bulwark}, a broad crystal bowl inlaid with faience designs of ibises (worth 300 gp), and an onyx-and-marble statue of Nethys (worth 200 gp). In addition, the PCs also find a ledger detailing many Scarlet Triad transactions. With a successful @Check[guild-lore|dc:28] or a @Check[society|dc:35] check, a PC paging through the ledger determines that the Scarlet Triad has been dodging taxes, undercutting competition, and attempting to accumulate a lot of money very quickly-all in ways that quietly harm the Fleshmonger Federation, Aspis Consortium, and church of Abadar. Once for each guild, a PC can use the ledger when Influencing a Guild to reduce that organization's Support Points by an additional 2 points. The second time the PCs complete this Opportunity, they recover a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.K2rMmiBlzcysNuj6]{Belt of Regeneration}, as well as an alabaster-and-silver amphoriskos perfume bottle within which is bound the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.pathfinder-bestiary.Actor.GyigGu36XLPV72nW]{Djinni} vizier Palqari the Wise. The Scarlet Triad trapped Palqari and offered him freedom in exchange for three wishes. Uri Zandivar already used two of these wishes to assist with the repair of the Orb of Gold Dragonkind, but then refrained from redeeming his last wish. Palqari is amenable to granting this last wish to the PCs if they help him escape; until then, he can't travel more than 20 feet from his amphoriskos, nor can he move it himself. This wish can be used to automatically rescue all of the slaves, but the PCs will still need to escape on their own. Although Palqari is eager to return to the Plane of Air, he could become a recurring ally later in the adventure at your discretion.

Critical Failure The PCs are noticed by a group of guards. At the end of every round of combat, Awareness increases by 1.

Make General Repairs.name: Allgemeine Reparaturen
Make General Repairs.description:
Requirements Crafting (trained), Specialty Crafting (woodworking), or hired woodworker; organized workers

You make general repairs to the citadel furnishings, replacing or fixing furniture, replacing rotted floorboards, and rehanging doors throughout the structure. This task takes 14 days of work and a @Check[crafting|dc:15] check.

Mental Ward.name: Mental Ward
Mental Ward.description:
Frequency once

Trigger You fail or critically fail a saving throw against a mental effect

Effect You're unaffected by the triggering effect.

Mesmerizing Performance.name: Fesselnde Darbietung
Mesmerizing Performance.description:
Anforderungen Die letzte Aktion des Tiergefährten war ein erfolgreicher Wurf für Darbietung zum @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.EEDElIyin4z60PXx]{Auftreten}. Der Tiergefährte hält seine Darbietung aufrecht, um ein einzelnes Ziel innerhalb von 9 m zu faszinieren, das den Erfolg der Darbietung gesehen hat. Das Ziel muss einen Willenswurf ablegen.

Erfolg Das Ziel ist nicht betroffen und ist vorübergehend für 1 Stunde immun.

Fehlschlag Das Ziel erhält für seine nächste Aktion den Zustand @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AdPVz7rbaVSRxHFg]{Fasziniert} und ist anschließend vorübergehend für 1 Stunde immun.

Kritischer Fehlschlag Das Ziel erhält für 1 Runde den Zustand @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AdPVz7rbaVSRxHFg]{Fasziniert}. Solange es Fasziniert ist, kann es keine Reaktionen ausführen.

Navigate Steamgrotto.name: Durch die Dampfgrotte
Navigate Steamgrotto.description:
You spend time observing the patterns of geyser eruptions in Steamgrotto, then plan your moves through the region as best you can to avoid exposing yourself to danger. You can attempt to Navigate Steamgrotto using Nature, Perception, or Survival and rolling a successful DC 35 check, but using Perception doesn't provide you deeper insights into the nature of the danger and you suffer a -4 circumstance penalty as a result.

Critical Success You avoid the danger and anyone who Follows the Expert gains double the normal bonus to their roll granted from that activity.

Success You avoid the danger.

Failure You step a bit too close to a few geysers and mistime your movements. You take @Damage[10d6[fire]] damage (@Check[reflex|dc:36|basic]).

Critical Failure You badly misjudge your movements and are hit full-force by a geyser. You take @Damage[20d6[fire]] damage (@Check[reflex|dc:36|basic]).

Obscure.name: Verbergen
Obscure.description:
Aspekt Schatten

Das Relikt absorbiert Licht und hüllt den Träger in Schatten ein und verbirgt einen in der Dunkelheit. Solange man sich in einem Bereich mit Schatten bei schwachem Licht befindet, kann man einen Wurf auf Heimlichkeit unternehmen, um sich zu @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.XMcnh4cSI32tljXa]{Verstecken}, selbst wenn man nicht vor der Kreatur @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{getarnt} ist, wie z.B. bei einer Kreatur mit Dunkelsicht.

Organize Labor.name: Arbeiter anheuern
Organize Labor.description:
You spend a day in Breachill recruiting workers to aid in a repair or an upgrade at Citadel Altaerein. Attempt a @Check[deception|dc:13], @Check[diplomacy|dc:13], or @Check[intimidation|dc:13] check to Organize Labor to organize workers, or a @Check[deception|dc:18], @Check[diplomacy|dc:18], or @Check[intimidation|dc:18] check for specialists.

If you use Deception or Intimidation for this check, you gain a +2 circumstance bonus, but failure comes with extra risks, as detailed below. Using Diplomacy grants no bonus to the check, but comes without added risk. When you Organize Labor, you must specify one repair or upgrade activity to be undertaken; once you successfully Organize Labor, you must begin that activity within a week.

A force of organized workers costs 1 gp per day, while a force of organized specialists costs 5 gp per day.

Critical Success You organize labor for the full duration of the repair or upgrade activity, and the cost to pay the workers is halved for the duration.

Success You organize labor for the full duration of a repair or upgrade activity.

Failure You organize labor for a single day of a repair or upgrade activity. Unless you used Diplomacy, word of your deceptive or intimidating nature spreads, and you take a -1 circumstance penalty to all future checks to organize labor. This penalty increases with each subsequent failure, to a maximum penalty of -4.

Critical Failure You completely fail to organize labor. If you used Deception or Intimidation, word of your untrustworthiness or cruelty spreads, and you can no longer use that skill to Organize Labor.

Pander to the Crowd.name: Die Menge anheizen
Pander to the Crowd.description:
Anforderungen Dies ist deine erste Handlung in einem Gladiatorenkampf oder du hast während eines Gladiatorenkampfes einem Gegner Schaden zugefügt oder ihn sichtlich behindert.

Mit einer höhnischen Geste, einem triumphierenden Hieb oder einer mutigen Herausforderung inspirierst du die Menge, dir zuzujubeln. Lege einen Fertigkeitswurf für Akrobatik, Athletik, Darbietung oder Einschüchtern ab. Der SG richtet sich meistens nach der Stufe der Begegnung. Die Menge wird allerdings durch Wiederholungen gelangweilt; sollte dieselbe Fertigkeit zweimal in Folge zum Anheizen der Menge genutzt werden (egal wer handelt), unterliegt der Wurf einem Situationsbonus von -2. Im Falle eines Kritischen Erfolges bei einem Angriffswurf in diesem Zug erlangst du einen Situationsbonus von +2 auf den Fertigkeitswurf für Die Menge anheizen.

Kritischer Erfolg Die Menge wird wild! Du kannst entweder dir selbst einen Zustandsbonus von +3 auf Angriffs-, Schadens-, Rettungs- und Fertigkeitswürfe bis zum Ende deines nächsten Zuges verleihen oder dir und all deinen Verbündeten einen Zustandsbonus von +2 auf dieselben Würfe bis zum Ende deines nächsten Zuges.

Erfolg Du sprichst die Menge an. - Wie beim Kritischen Erfolg, aber der Bonus ist +2 für dich bzw. +1 für dich und deine Verbündeten.

Fehlschlag Die Menge ist nicht beeindruckt.

Kritischer Fehlschlag Die Menge lacht über dich und unterstützt lieber deine Gegner. Die nächste dir Feindselig gestimmte Kreatur, welche Die Menge anheizen nutzt, erhält einen Situationsbonus von +4 auf den Fertigkeitswurf.

Perception Filter.name: Wahrnehmungsfilter
Perception Filter.description:
Aspect mind

Activate 2 envision

Frequency once per day

Effect Your relic reaches into the minds of nearby creatures and blocks your presence from their perceptions. For the next 10 minutes, a creature that enters a @Template[type:emanation|distance:120], centered on you, must attempt a secret @Check[will|against:class-spell|traits:secret] save, after which the creature is then temporarily immune for 1 day.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success The creature takes a –2 status penalty to Perception checks to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.BlAOM2X92SI6HMtJ]{Seek} or otherwise detect you.

Failure You filter all of the creature's senses, making it difficult for it to notice you. When you are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{Hidden} or undetected from the creature, it doesn't observe you as soon as you do anything other than @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.XMcnh4cSI32tljXa]{Hide}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.VMozDqMMuK5kpoX4]{Sneak}, or Step. If it rolls a Perception check to Seek or otherwise detect you, it gets the outcome one degree of success worse than what it rolled, and if you roll a Stealth check to Hide, Sneak, or otherwise escape its attention, you get the outcome one degree of success better than what you rolled against the creature. If you use a hostile action toward the creature, the effect ends for that creature after your hostile action is completed.

Critical Failure As failure, but the effect doesn't end for that creature if you use a hostile action against it.

Perform a Trick.name: Trick aufführen
Perform a Trick.description:
Du führst deinen Signaturzirkustrick auf. Lege einen der mit deinem Trick assoziierten Trickwürfe ab. Der SG bestimmt sich nach deiner Stufe (siehe GRW, S. 503, Tabelle 10-5). Das Ergebnis jedes Trickwurfs bestimmt, ob du Begeisterung hervorrufst, Begeisterung und Vorfreude erzeugst oder Begeisterung verlierst.

Kritischer Erfolg Du erzeugst Begeisterung in Höhe der Stufe des Tricks; addiere diese Begeisterung zum Gesamtbegeisterungswert für die Vorstellung. Du erzeugst zudem Vorfreude in Höhe der halben Stufe des Tricks (aufgerundet); addiere diese Vorfreude zur Gesamtvorfreude für die Vorstellung.

Erfolg Du erzeugst Begeisterung in Höhe der Stufe des Tricks; addiere diese Begeisterung zum Gesamtbegeisterungswert für die Vorstellung.

Fehlschlag Kein Effekt.

Kritischer Fehlschlag Der Begeisterungswert für die Vorstellung sinkt um die halbe Stufe des Tricks (aufgerundet).

Du kannst Trick aufführen mehrmals pro Akt nutzen und für jeden Versuch einen anderen möglichen Trickwurf ablegen. Nutzt du Trick aufführen zweimal während desselben Aktes, unterliegt dein zweiter Trickwurf einem Malus von -5. Nutzt du Trick aufführen dreimal während desselben Aktes, unterliegt dein dritter Trickwurf einem Malus von -10 (ähnlich dem Malus für Mehrfachangriffe). Diese Mali werden auf -4 bzw. -8 reduziert, sollte dein Trick die Kategorie Agil besitzen.

Diese Aktion besitzt stets die Kategorie Zirkus. Mit der 1. Stufe kannst du eine weitere Trickkategorie für deinen Signaturtrick wählen, zu der du Zugang hast, und diese ebenfalls auf die Aktion anwenden. Im Laufe deiner Stufenprogression kannst du weitere Kategorien hinzufügen (siehe Tabelle 2).

Position the Hunters.name: Jäger positionieren
Position the Hunters.description:
With the target game animals located, you must move to an advantageous position without startling the prey. Attempt a Stealth check.

  • Against an impressive and dangerous find: @Check[stealth|dc:25]
  • Against standard game: @Check[stealth|dc:20]
  • Against river turtles, bats, and lesser game: @Check[stealth|dc:15]

Critical Success The animals have no indication that they are in danger, and you gain a +2 circumstance bonus to rolls made during the hunting phase.

Success You position yourself well and take no penalty when Hunting.

Failure Your loud and clumsy movements alert the animals to your presence, and you take a -2 circumstance penalty to rolls made during the hunting phase.

Critical Failure You stumble loudly and startle the majority of the animals, which escape and leave the party with very few animals to catch. The party loses 2 IP.

Post Snipers.name: Heckenschützen positionieren
Post Snipers.description:
Die Narlmark-Jäger sind fähige Waldleute; indem die SC ein paar Bogenschützen aus der Armee abkommandieren und sie an versteckten Orten auf Dächern und in Bäumen positionieren, können sie so ihr Potenzial maximieren.

Kritischer Erfolg Die Heckenschützen werden an mehreren Schlüsselpositionen postiert. Lege am Ende einer Runde während der Schlacht um Tatzelfurt einen Fernkampfangriff [[/r 1d20+18 #Fernkampfangriff]]{+18} gegen eine aktuell nicht im Nahkampf befindliche Armee ab. Die Heckenschützen fügen bei Erfolg der Armee 1 Schadenspunkt zu (bzw. 2 Schadenspunkte bei einem Kritischen Erfolg). Die Heckenschützen können diesen Bonusangriff während der Schlacht maximal 3 Mal ausführen, aber nicht öfter als einmal am Ende einer Runde.

Erfolg Wie beim Kritischen Erfolg, aber die Heckenschützen können während der Schlacht insgesamt nur einen Bonusangriff ausführen.

Kritischer Fehlschlag Die Heckenschützen wurden an Orten positioniert, aus denen sich keine Vorteile ergeben. Außerdem haben die SC die Narlmark-Jäger zu sehr ausgedünnt; diese Armee erleidet während der Schlacht einen Malus von -2 auf Fernkampfangriffe.

Practical Research.name: Practical Research
Practical Research.description:
Requirement You are a conversant or lore-speaker.

You identify something interesting in the field and perform special research on it. This requires an appropriate check, which the GM will describe when the opportunity arises. The results of the check vary. While they typically include all the benefits of the Study activity, some opportunities for Practical Research also offer unique benefits, such as access to new character options.

Prepare Firepots.name: Feuertöpfe vorbereiten
Prepare Firepots.description:
With the knowledge that there are some trolls in the army, preparation of firepots containing alchemical fire, oil, or some form of quickly combustible material may be invaluable to the battle. Preparing Firepots requires a Crafting (trained) check.
